sql.if: and ( upper(name) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(phone) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(start_time) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(end_time) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(reg_date) like upper('%${keyword}%') )

mapper.select: select b_no ,r.resume_no ,p.p_no ,p.name ,p.phone ,p.addr ,c.career1 ,c.career2 ,c.career3 ,c.career4 ,c.career5 ,l.license_name1 ,l.license_name2 ,l.license_name3 ,l.license_name4 ,l.license_name5 ,to_char(f.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" ,to_char(f.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_date" ,f.subject ,f.pwd ,f.preferred_work ,f.start_time ,f.end_time ,f.content ,to_char(f.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reg_date" from person_mem p, freelancer f, career c, person_license l , resume r where f.b_no= #{f.b_no} and f.p_no=p.p_no and f.p_no=r.p_no and r.resume_no=c.resume_no and r.resume_no=l.resume_no

select count(*) from ( select b_no ,f.p_no ,p.p_no ,p.name ,p.phone ,f.subject ,f.preferred_work ,f.start_time ,f.end_time ,to_char(f.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_date" ,to_char(f.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as "end_date" ,to_char(f.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as "reg_date" from person_mem p, freelancer f where p.p_no= f.p_no
and ( upper(name) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(phone) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(preferred_work) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(subject) like upper('%${keyword}%') )
and to_number(to_char(f.end_date,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))>0 and
to_number(to_char(f.start_date,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))<0
and( upper(addr) like upper('%${work_place}%') )
order by b_no desc
order by ${sort}
)

select count(*) from freelancer where b_no=#{b_no}
and ( upper(name) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(phone) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(preferred_work) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(subject) like upper('%${keyword}%') )
select count(*) from freelancer where b_no=#{b_no} and pwd=#{pwd}
